renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy - 0.5;	// center coords
    uv *= 2. + sin(iTime);						// scale down
    uv = fract(uv);								// repeat
    uv = abs((uv - 0.5) * 2.);					// remap to center of repeated coords
    fragColor = texture(iChannel0, uv);			// grab texture pixels
}
renderpass.name: Image
